content: the back loop pyort = remount the yo so that the leading leg is behind the needle and purl through the front loop tutorials judy s magic cast-on https //knitty com/issuespring06/featmagiccaston html german short row https //www interweave com/article/knitting/how-to-knit-german-short- row-make-double-stitch/ jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off https //knitty com/issuefall09/featjssbo php work the toe up sock toe using judy s magic cast-on see tutorials link and leaving a longer tail than normal cast on 6 7 7 stitches per needle do not knit the first half round i usually leave a tail that is about 45 cm/18 inches because i use the tail as a row counter up the foot knit one round 12 14 14 stitches total using the tail and the working yarn knit one round to double the number of stitches drop the tail yarn and knit one round with the main yarn 24 28 28 stitches total conjoined sock twins v6 0 ©2025 katherine richmond rinaradish 3 of 12 place markers for both the beginning of the round bor and after 12 14 14 stitches marking the middle of the round mor while working always slip the markers as they are encountered here and through out the pattern toe increase rounds note all yarn overs are knit twisted to close up any holes a k1 yo knit until 1 stitch before marker yo k1 repeat a1 k1 yo k2 kyot knit until 4 stitches before marker kyort k2 yo k1 repeat b k1 kyot k1 yo knit until 3 stitches before marker yo k1 kyort k1 repeat c knit all stitches working kyot and kyort as needed to close the yos work toe as follows round 1 a 28 32 32 stitches total round 2 b 32 36 36 stitches total round 3 a1 round 4 b round 5 c 40 44 44 stitches total round 6 a round 7 b round 8 c 48 52 52 stitches total round 9 a round 10 b round 11 c 56 60 60 stitches total round 12 a round 13 c 60 64 64 stitches total round 14 c round 15 b work the kyot/kyort as just regular knit stitches round 16 c 64 68 68 stitches total sizes 64 and 68 skip ahead to foot size 72 work the following 2 additional rounds round 17 a round 18 c - - 72 stitches total foot now work in pattern until the start of the gusset the gusset adds 32 34 36 rounds before the heel flap for my eu 40 us 9 foot i work 50 rounds about 14 cm/5 5 inches including the toe the heel turn will add about 2 5 cm/1 inch to the length of the sole of the foot 16 row over the first half of the round work the instep pattern as follows size 64 k1 p2 k2 x 7 p2 k1 size 68 k2 p2 k2 x 8 size 72 k1 p1 k1 p2 k2 x 7 p2 k1 p1 k1
